name: Napa Extra Medicine
description: Napa Extra is used for pain relief and fever reduction. It is effective for treating headaches, muscle pain, and other mild to moderate discomfort.

name: Ventolin Inhaler
description: Ventolin Inhaler is used to treat or prevent bronchospasm in people with reversible obstructive airway disease.

name: Hydrocortisone Ointment
description: Hydrocortisone Ointment is used to relieve skin irritation, redness, and swelling caused by conditions such as eczema and dermatitis.

name: Amoxicillin Injection
description: Amoxicillin Injection is an antibiotic used to treat a wide variety of bacterial infections. It works by stopping the growth of bacteria.

name: Vitamin C Capsules
description: Vitamin C Capsules are essential for the growth and repair of tissues in the body. They are used to prevent and treat vitamin C deficiency.

name: Cough Syrup
description: Cough Syrup is used to relieve coughs caused by the common cold, bronchitis, and other breathing illnesses.

name: Ibuprofen Tablets
description: Ibuprofen Tablets are used to reduce fever and treat pain or inflammation caused by many conditions such as headache, toothache, arthritis, and menstrual cramps.

name: Bronchodilator Inhaler
description: Bronchodilator Inhaler is used to open the airways and make breathing easier in people with lung diseases like asthma and COPD.

name: Antibiotic Ointment
description: Antibiotic Ointment is used to treat or prevent skin infections in minor cuts, scrapes, or burns.

name: Multivitamin Capsules
description: Multivitamin Capsules provide essential vitamins and minerals to help fill nutritional gaps and support overall health.
